response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product embodies innovation, quality, and functionality, making it an exceptional choice for those seeking the best. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, we believe it's worth more than just $12,000 to you. Considering its value, I'm offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece for a special introductory price of $15,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to make a decision soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 15000}
